titleStmt.title: Man preserv'd from drowning in any kind of water, by a new light, hollow girdle, fill'd with his breath; ...
titleStmt.author: Cruys, Francis.

notesStmt.note: Title from first lines of text.
Wing says the British Library has two settings.
The last line of text ends: "Chairing-cross."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
